import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Container, AppBar, Toolbar, Button, Divider, Paper, Grid, useTheme, Link, } from '@mui/material'; import ChatWidget from '../components/ChatWidget'; import SearchIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Search'; // Import a Clark University logo if available // import ClarkLogo from '../assets/clark-logo.png'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const theme = useTheme(); return ( {/* Top Navigation Bar */} {/* Main Navigation */} {/* Logo placeholder - replace with actual logo */} CLARK UNIVERSITY {/* Main Navigation Links */} Who We Are Admissions Academics Life at Clark {/* Hero Section */} {/* Base Background - Dark Overlay */} {/* Campus Image */} {/* Clark Hall Image */} We are a force for change Clark University cultivates dynamic, hands-on educational experiences so together, we can connect extraordinary ideas and create far-reaching impact. {/* Main Content */} Welcome to Clark University Challenging convention. Changing our world. Clark University is a private research university in Worcester, Massachusetts. Founded in 1887, it is the oldest educational institution founded as an all-graduate university in the United States. Clark now also educates undergraduates. The university's academic programs are organized into numerous schools and departments, with a strong focus on liberal arts, sciences, and professional studies. Clark is noted for its programs in the fields of psychology, geography, physics, biology, and entrepreneurship. Need assistance? Try our new AI Chatbox by clicking the chat icon in the bottom right corner! Quick Links Apply Now Request Information Visit Campus Academic Calendar Tuition & Financial Aid Featured Resources Academic Programs Explore our undergraduate, graduate, and doctoral programs across various disciplines. Learn More → Campus Life Discover student organizations, housing options, dining, and recreational activities. Learn More → Research Opportunities Learn about our research centers, faculty-led projects, and opportunities for students. Learn More → {/* Footer */} Clark University 950 Main Street
Worcester, MA 01610
Phone: (508) 793-7711 Connect With Us Facebook Twitter Instagram LinkedIn Resources Employment Accessibility Privacy Policy Emergency Information © {new Date().getFullYear()} Clark University. All rights reserved. {/* Chat Widget */} ); }; export default HomePage;
